item.title: H.R. 4943 - Clarifying Lawful Overseas Use of Data Act or CLOUD ACT
item.description: Authors: Collins, Doug Published: February 2018 URL: https://www.congress.gov/bill/115th-congress/house-bill/4943 Tags: 2010s Bill CLOUD Act Data Storage Foreign International Law Enforcement US Congress Abstract: Summary of H.R.4943 - 115th Congress (2017-2018): CLOUD Act

item.title: Promoting Public Saftey, Privacy, and the Rule of Law Around the World: The Purpose and Impact of the CLOUD Act
item.description: Authors: U.S. Department of Justice Published: April 2019 Tags: 2010s CLOUD Act Department of Justice Foreign International Law Enforcement

item.title: S.2889 - National Security and Personal Data Protection Act of 2019
item.description: Authors: Hawley and Cotton and Rubio Published: November 2019 Tags: 2010s Bill Cybersecurity Foreign Investment National Security and Personal Data Protection Act of 2019 Security Requirements US Congress Abstract: To safeguard data of Americans from foreign governments that pose risks to national security by imposing data security requirements and strengthening review of foreign investments, and for other purposes.
